name: Run For Your Life! (jereminchar)
description:
Run for your life! Is an endless runner game

where you try to obtain a healthy lifestyle through the balance of

exercise, work and home. 

+Objective: earn as many ‘life points’ as possible through collection of coins

+Avoid obstacles, no extra lives 

+Change lanes, jump or slide 

+3 different lanes, from left to right: Exercise, Work, Home

Each lane will present different challenges, with different rewards. Balance your life carefully and get as much life out of your run as you can! 

credits
